channel.title: Ubuntu LDAP Installation :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Note PHPLDAPAdmin no longer works on Ubuntu 22.04 since it has several incompatibility issues with PHP 8+. The assignment is being updated to use the new LDAP Account Manager (LAM) software instead. The video above will be updated soon to include LAM instead of PHPLDAPAdmin Resources How to Install OpenLDAP on Ubuntu Server 22.04 from TechRepublic How To Install and Configure OpenLDAP and phpLDAPadmin on Ubuntu 16.04 from DigitalOcean (works for 22.
